short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a sync button to GIT repositories hosted on third party platforms to sync and analyse code with The Code Registry.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# The Code Registry's Browser Extension

This browser extension makes it easier to sync the contents of a GIT repository into a code vault on The Code Registry, where the code will be automatically analysed by our bespoke tools and AI engine.

It automatically adds a "Sync & Analyse" button to GitHub and GitLab when viewing a repository (BitBucket and more coming soon).

Data and insights that we generate can then be viewed in our web app and you'll automatically receive a PDF report too

## Syncing to an existing account

If you already have an account with us you'll be able to login and then the GIT repository will automatically be created within The Code Registry to start being analysed.

If you have synced the repository to The Code Registry before, instead of creating another code vault, the existing one will be updated with a new version using the latest code from your repository.

## If you don't have an account

If you don't yet have an account with us, you'll need to create one first. You can do that on our site - https://thecoderegistry.com/pricing/

You can always create a free account but this only has access to a demo project to start exploring the platform.

You'll need a paid account to start syncing your own repositories!
